about_the_game:
Explore a Digital World where you can collect and train creatures to build your ultimate team. Defend your upgradeable basement from waves of enemy attacks and strategically manage your resources to achieve evolutions. Travel through time to uncover the secret to prevent the impending Armageddon.

Collect Creatures

Defeat wild enemies to get their eggs that hatch into allies! Each creature brings unique abilities to your team, adding new evolution lines and endless possibilities. Build your dream squad and defeat evil bosses in the Digital World!

Upgrade Your Basement

As you advance, you can transform your basement into a place where your units can get the best equipment, buffs, unlock abilities and items to help lin your adventure.

Improve Your Team

Manage resources to unlock new evolutions for your creatures, perform special summoning rituals and create your strongest team.

name: Digital Legacy of Zero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ Cores, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GTX 970 or better
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Explore a Digital World where you can collect and train creatures to build your ultimate team. Defend your upgradeable basement from waves of enemy attacks and strategically manage your resources to achieve evolutions. Travel through time to uncover the secret to prevent the impending Armageddon.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
